tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select the features here to be calculated. One entry in the list not necessarily adds exactly one additional plane to the resulting feature image. Some might add more. A more detailed description of the features and the parameters can be found at http://fiji.sc/Trainable_Weka_Segmentation#Training_features.
If checked, the features will be calculated in a multithreaded, i.e. parallel, manner.

The label of the dimension to be added to the input images. For further processing please make sure that the dimenion label is available in the according dialogs by adding it in the preferences of the Image Processing Extension.

ports.outPort: The feature images. Please note that normalization might be necessary (e.g. in the Table Cell View) to make to feature images visible.
